title: T-Pain Rant, Emmy Awards, Greg Abbott, Olympics, Office Question and more.
itunes:title: T-Pain Rant, Emmy Awards, Greg Abbott, Olympics, Office Question and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! "All I'm Is Is Here." The Chief Love Officer reminds a woman just how easy a divorce really is. Cedric The Entertainer will be hosting the 2021 Emmys from Microsoft Theater on September 19. Texas Governor Greg Abbott is trippin'! The Rappa Turnt Sanga is not happy with the music that he has been sent and went off on social media. What happened with Team USA Basketball? First Lady Jill Biden will be on hand to support Team USA in Tokyo this year. We have a million dollar office question just for you. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve reminds us to stay away from negative people because they have a problem for every solution.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
